bibl.title: The Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications. 8
bibl.note: A body of evidence permits to infer the dependence of Hermetic groups (schools?) on the Egyptian temples and temple theology.
Alan B. LLOYD (Ed.), Studies in Pharaonic Religion and Society in Honour of J. Gwyn Griffiths =The Egypt Exploration Society. Occasional Publications. 8 (London, 1992) pp. 258-261.
